channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 6 foods that could be making you age faster
item.description: New research shows how your diet may also play a role in how well you age.

item.title: France's political future hangs in the balance as votes cast in final round of snap election
item.description: French voters are heading to the polls on Sunday for the second and final round of voting in a snap parliamentary election.

item.title: Biden dismisses concerns over age and health in interview, vows to stay in race
Nvidia will win the race to a $4 trillion market cap—but the long-term big tech battle might be different, experts say
item.description: “I think, a year from now, we [will] have three $4 trillion market cap companies: Nvidia, Apple, Microsoft,” Wedbush tech analyst Dan Ives told Fortune.

item.title: Judge Aileen Cannon grants Trump's request to pause some deadlines in classified documents case
item.description: The order marks the latest fallout from the Supreme Court’s presidential immunity decision on Monday.

item.title: What Nvidia investors can learn from the Roaring '20s and the radio bubble
Florida farmers turn to an ancient tree from India as the state’s once-famous citrus industry dries up
item.description: “For the most part, the citrus industry has died in Florida.”

item.title: Biden's TV interview fails to quell re-election concerns among lawmakers, donors and strategists
item.description: Concerns about President Biden have grown in the days since he delivered a stumbling debate performance against Donald Trump.

item.title: S&P 500's rally continues as jobs data show cooling ‘but not collapsing’ economy
British fashion house Burberry is reportedly laying off hundreds of employees amid huge stock selloff
item.description: Employees were informed during a Zoom meeting in late June, with those affected told they were facing redundancy or having to reapply for their roles.

item.title: Beryl set to strengthen on approach to Texas due to hot ocean temperatures
item.description: Beryl is expected to reach southern Texas by Sunday night or Monday morning, regaining hurricane status as it crosses over the toasty Gulf of Mexico.

item.title: Fourth of July fireworks did a number on New York’s air quality
Alec Baldwin is about to go on trial in the death of ‘Rust’ cinematographer. Here are key things to know
item.description: Baldwin is charged with felony involuntary manslaughter. If a jury unanimously convicts him, he could get 18 months in prison.

item.title: This ETF is trying to satisfy appetites for weight loss stocks
item.description: Tema ETFs is behind the GLP-1, Obesity & Cardiometabolic ETF (HRTS), which is up 26% since its inception last November.

item.title: S&P 500 ends holiday week at all-time high as Nasdaq books 3.5% weekly advance
